Stations¶

Charging station objects used in the HIVE simulation platform.

class hive.stations.FuelStation(station_id, latitude, longitude, plugs, plug_type, plug_power_kw, clock)[source]¶

Base class for electric vehicle charging station.

Parameters

  • station_id (int) – Identifer assigned to FuelStation object

  • latitude (float) – Latitude of station location

  • longitude (float) – Longitude of station location

  • plugs (int) – Number of plugs at location

  • plug_type (str) – Plug type - AC or DC

  • plug_power_kw (float) – Plug power in kW

  • clock (hive.utils.Clock) – simulation clock shared across the simulation to track simulation time steps.

dispense_energy()[source]¶

Returns the amount of energy that the station dispenses during one simulation time step.

Returns

energy_kwh – Amount of energy dispensed in a time step. Units are kilowatt-hours.

Return type

float

step()[source]¶

Called each time step. Station updates its state and log history.
